p: The colour of the various fractions can impact the consumer perceptions and acceptance when it is used in products, so is important to consider before product development. The colour of each fraction and LM are shown in Table 4. Processing of the LM did affect the appearance of the three fractions for L*, a*, b* and âˆ†E values ( p < 0.05, p = 0.000). SF was the lightest sample, followed by ILF, SLF, and finally LM was the darkest.
